 SOURCE : VIDEO - 1080p Troublemaker / AUDIO - An Old FRiEND/TROUBLEMAKER


 Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
 Check sample and see.....


 Right video ...Pure and simple CLASS cam!!
 Had some faults like ANY cam would do but this is one of THE best cams ever done,so take a bow
 cammer....whoever you are.
 Video did have a little border at the bottom and also a slight bit of glare and if anything maybe
 too much colour.
 Oh this video also has the end scene,when the credits are rolling.... :)

 Audio ....some very nice line audio,with some hiss and noise to it,but MUCH better than the cam audio we all used.


 First off dropped the 1080 into vdub ...used null for cropping,then resized it to a 720p and used modd16.
 Then from there i changed th contrast and brightness levels and used intes to lower the glares and
 for once actually lowered the colouring.
 No smoother used just added a bit more sharpness.
 Almost looks like a dvdrip now ....its that good. ( down to the sors being that good ).

 Audio...just dropped in adobe and changed all the EQ bands to my liking and then used a hiss reduction filter with a custom
 template i made to remove the hiss without killing the audio :)
 Now runtime was different and the audio started to lag ...by the end it was 6 secs oos ...so had to shrink 
 it,twice in the end,to get it in sync.
 Once done ...just muxed to our rip.

 Overall V9 ...A9 ...M8 ( based on 10 being best cam / best line audio )...IMHO of course.
